FuncDef:
The negotiation-detect-multiplier command sets the detection multiplier during BFD negotiation.
The undo negotiation-detect-multiplier command cancels the specified detection multiplier during BFD negotiation. The negotiation-detect-multiplier command sets the detection multiplier during BFD negotiation. The undo negotiation-detect-multiplier command cancels the specified detection multiplier during BFD negotiation. By default, the detection multiplier for BFD packet sending is not specified. The default value is 50.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the detection multiplier during BFD negotiation.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 50. The default value is 50, indicating that the default detection multiplier 50 is used during BFD negotiation.
